entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers changing to 40 percent chance of drizzle or showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
